title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return some user recognizable strings
OB: When calling IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction, the method returns an empty or non-user recognizable string. However, calling the same method after data extraction returns a meaningful and user recognizable string.
EB: The IMetaData.getColumnLabel() method should consistently return user recognizable strings, both before and after data extraction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() before data extraction.
2. Note the returned string, if any.
3. Extract the data.
4. Call IMetaData.getColumnLabel() again.
5. Compare the returned string after data extraction with the initial value.
